msg: On the merge-tracking branch: A follow-up to r23949 (from trunk),
using the new svn_wc__entry_versioned() API to eliminate more
Reposition include of svn_wc_private.h.  Replace calls to
svn_wc_entry(), subsequent checks of the returned entry, and error
generation with a call to svn_wc__entry_versioned().

author: ehu
msg: Replace hacky l10n status reporting shell scripts with a python script.

author: lgo
msg: Fix issue 2420: learn svn st -u to show status of locally deleted directories.
(make_dir_baton): don't consider status svn_wc_status_deleted as a reason to
not show the status of that directory.
